name: Black Hills Corporation
description: Black Hills Corporation is a diversified energy company headquartered in Rapid City, South Dakota. Founded in 1941, the company operates through various segments including electric and natural gas utilities, as well as a growing portfolio in renewable energy. Black Hills provides essential energy services to over one million customers across eight states, including Colorado, Wyoming, South Dakota, and Nebraska. The company is committed to sustainable energy practices and is actively expanding its investment in renewable energy sources such as wind and solar power. Black Hills has a substantial presence in the utility sector, operating both electric and gas distribution systems, and it has made significant investments to modernize and enhance the reliability of its infrastructure. The company’s mission is to deliver reliable, affordable energy while promoting environmental stewardship and community engagement. Black Hills also engages in the production and sale of natural gas, and it operates a coal mining business that serves as a key energy source. The firm’s focus on customer satisfaction, regulatory compliance, and sustainable practices positions it as a leader in the energy sector, adapting to the evolving energy landscape while maintaining a strong commitment to the communities it serves.
